data.eml:eml: Neotype designation for Sphingius thecatus Thorell, 1890, synonymies, new records and descriptions of six new species from Southeast Asia (Araneae, Liocranidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dankittipakul, Pakawin, Tavano, Maria, Singtripop, Tippawan (2011): Neotype designation for Sphingius thecatus Thorell, 1890, synonymies, new records and descriptions of six new species from Southeast Asia (Araneae, Liocranidae). Zootaxa 3066: 1-20, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201922
